post.title: Raffle Fundraiser Update
post.description: The basket raffle Is only a few weeks away. We still have some tickets available (see attachment) so
post.content:
The basket raffle Is only a few weeks away. We still have some tickets available (see attachment) so plan on ordering your tickets soon! Space is limited.

We are also in need of some donation items to help fill the baskets. If you have anything you think would add to the baskets below, let me know. I can come pick it up!

  • Night out at the movies (still looking for passes)
  • In the garden
  • Golf with friends
  • Sports
  • Day at the spa

Thank you in advance!

Anne
330-304-2499
iannehdg@gmail.com
